body.name: HP E24d G4 Advanced Docking Monitor (Pefect Integration of Monitor and Docking Station), 24" Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS Display, IR Webcam, RJ-45, DP, HDMI, USB-C, USB 3, Audio Port, with Docztorm Dock
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 18 hrs 25 mins.
features: [Features]: 23.8" IPS LCD FHD (1920 x 1080), 60 Hz Refresh Rate, HP Eye Ease, Anti-glare, Brightness 250 nits, On-screen controls, Pivot rotation, IR sensor; Low blue light mode, Network Manageability, IR webcam, Height adjustable

[Built-in Docking Station with Ports for Everything] 1 RJ-45; 1 DisplayPort 1.2-out; 1 USB Type-C (downstream); 4 USB 3.1 (downstream, fast charging 7.5 W) ; USB Type-C video input: 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery up to 100W, Alt Mode DisplayPort 1.4); 1 HDMI 1.4; 1 DisplayPort 1.2; 1 DisplayPort 1.2-out; 4 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; Audio port: 1 Headphone Out Combo Jack.

[Find your comfort zone and Adjust your view] Work comfortably with adjustable tilt, height, and swivel settings. Use pivot rotation to conveniently customize portrait or landscape views on multiple displays. Keep your eyes comfortable through the workday with HP Eye Ease, our first built-in, always-on blue light filter that presents your vivid content with zero impact on your color accuracy, no OSD required.

[Take your PC off the desk] Clear your clutter by mounting your HP EliteDesk Mini Desktop PC directly behind the display and powering it through USB-C. Or, lift the whole solution and mount it on a wall or arm. It is compatible with 100 mm x 100 mm VESA Mount.
Docztorm Dock (Special Edition Portable Docztorm Data Hub;Super Speedy Data Syn Rate upto 5Gbps)
body.description: Drive your workspace from USB-C Connect, charge, and power your PC up to 100W through one USB-C cable , then embrace the easy connectivity of additional ports like USB and RJ-45. Expand to dual displays by daisy-chaining through DisplayPort. Simplify everyday tasks Instantly turn on your display and laptop, even when the lid is closed, with a single button on the display. Login with your face and Windows Hello on the webcam with IR, or use it to videoconference. Specifications Table Display size: 23.8 inch Display type: IPS Brightness: 250 nits Native resolution: FHD (1920 x 1080) Display features: Advanced haze; Language selection; On-screen controls; Pivot rotation; Plug and Play; IR sensor; Low blue light mode; Single Power ON; Network Manageability; Anti-glare; IR webcam; Height adjustable Input signal: 1 DisplayPort 1.2 in (with HDCP support); 1 HDMI 1.4 (with HDCP support); 1 USB Type-C (DisplayPort 1.4, power delivery up to 100 W) Ports and Connectors: 1 RJ-45; 1 DisplayPort 1.2-out; 1 USB Type-C (downstream); 4 USB 3.1 (downstream, fast charging 7.5 W) ; USB Type-C video input: 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery up to 100W, Alt Mode DisplayPort 1.4); 1 HDMI 1.4; 1 DisplayPort 1.2; 1 DisplayPort 1.2-out; 4 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; Audio port: 1 Headphone Out Combo Jack HDCP: Yes, DisplayPort and HDMI Camera: Yes, FHD IR Camera 1080p Power: 100 - 240 VAC 50/60 Hz Dimensions: 21.24 x 1.91 x 12.73 in; 53.94 x 4.85 x 32.33 cm (Without stand.) Weight: 15.13 lb Physical security features: Security lock-ready Bezel: 3-sided micro-edge Swivel: ±30° Tilt: -5 to +20° Height adjustment range: 150 mm VESA mounting: 100 mm x 100 mm Screen treatment: Anti-glare Microphone: Yes Speakers: No Includes Dockztorm USB Dock (Special Edition Portable Docztorm Data Hub)
